name: Panzer
description:
Panzer is all about fast and stylish tank PVP combat. Boost, drift and flip your way through any kind of terrain in order to destroy your opponents. The damage model is based on armor thickness, impact angle, and weapon charge. Easy to learn, hard to master.


Panzer equips the player with a set of abilities that can be mixed and matched to create unique combinations that fit your style.


Join our Panzer community to be the first to know about updates and to participate in weekly playtest.
